security: Disclosing the cover status and arrangements for Luis Posada Carriles, including his employment with RECE and payments from LACT, could compromise his operational security and expose CIA methods. Quoting directly: 'For security reasons, POSADA can no longer claim Gri-State Engineering Service as his place of employment.'
summary: A memo regarding the cover status of Luis Posada Carriles, specifically his employment with RECE and the need to change his listed employer for security reasons.
summary_one_paragraph: This secret memorandum, dated September 7, 1966, addresses the cover status of Luis Posada Carriles (201-300985), who is employed by RECE, a Cuban exile organization in Miami. As Posada is also being paid by LACT to report on RECE activities, the memo requests that his previous employment with Gri-State Engineering Service be terminated effective July 31, 1966, to maintain Posada's security and conceal his true affiliations.
title: Cover Status of Luis POSADA Carriles (201-300985)
